title: Remove leading whitespace before Hero intro paragraph

requirements.summary: Remove the single leading whitespace before the Hero intro paragraph text while preserving the existing intro box styling and downstream spacing.
acceptanceCriteria: The rendered intro paragraph begins immediately with the letter “H” in “Hello”, with no visible leading space/indent before the first character.
No additional whitespace is added after the intro message; the layout below the intro block remains visually unchanged.
The intro block’s existing styling (including its background/border/spacing classes) remains unchanged aside from eliminating the leading whitespace artifact.

file_operations.description:
Update the intro

content so that the first character 'H' in “Hello there, and welcome…” is not preceded by a newline/indentation whitespace text node (caused by formatting combined with whitespace-pre-wrap). Keep the neon-green-intro-box wrapper and all existing className styling intact, and ensure spacing after the message and below the intro block is unchanged.
